help.title: Help
help.wiki: For a complete guide, visit the wiki
help.brush: To change the brush size, use the scroll wheel.
help.undo: To undo, press CTRL+Z. Only the last action can be undone.
help.camera: To enable camera interactions while the brush is visible, hold ALT.
help.tooltips: Hover over buttons to see helpful tooltips.
help.licenseText: You are free to use this software for personal use including free redistribution of the created assets. If you want to use this software for commercial purposes a Patreon subscription is required

settings.title: New File
settings.warning: These settings cannot be changed after initializing a new project

mobile: Mobile devices and non-Chromium browsers are unsupported for this site.
